Reviews.Title: “Overnight In Berlin-Great Hotel and Service”
Reviews.Author: stones80123
Reviews.Content: We arrived at 9pm at night for an early morning flight the next day. We were quoted at a 42 Euro Rate online and the reception delivered this excellent rate. The rooms were very clean and well appointed with a nice TV and cable. The shower was hot and the bed was very comfortable. I really enjoyed being in an older building using a key and an old Elevator and staircase. We have an infant child and the staff kept our food in their refrigerator and brought it to us in the morning. They made sure all of our needs were met and called a taxi cab for us at 4:30am in the morning. When we are in Berlin for a longer trip we will stay here again for a much better rate than the larger chains and less of a corporate feel.

Reviews.Title: “Great for airport access, Good otherwise.”
Reviews.Author: inamesh Posted by a Cleartrip traveler
Reviews.Content: This hotel is excellent value for money. We got a really good deal (40 Euros per night). Room and bathroom were standard and clean. The hotel is a short walk away from the Airport bus stop (which is also the U-Bahn station for getting to Berlin center). There are lots of cafes/shops around, and a big supermarket too (which also has a counter with freshly prepared food). There is a friendly Turkish Doner place right opposite the hotel, and a decent but smoky bar on the way between the metro station and the hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Great place for a stay if you have an early flight”
Reviews.Author: Anna K
Reviews.Content: The hotel is situated minutes away from a bus stop to Tegel Airport. I wouldn't stay here for more than one night. The place is noisy not only because of the traffic but also because of poor sound isolation between the rooms. We heard our neighbors having really good time together in 1 o'clock in the morning so we couldn't sleep. On the other hand, I liked the room very much. The furniture is really nice and you have everything you need - a table with chair, wardrobe. There were also paper, envelopes, pen and other stuff in the table. Our big bed was comfortable. The bathroom was nice too. They got everything there including hairdryer. The stuff was helpful and welcoming. We came in the morning before check-in time so we had to put our luggage somewhere. The only place for that was little room meant for using computer, fax and other things. The elevator and stairs in the hotel are really narrow. But it's not a problem. I would recommend staying here to catch early flight from Tegel.

Reviews.Title: “basic hotel near tegel airport so near you can see your plane!”
Reviews.Author: mykitten
Reviews.Content: very handy for tegel airport. The bus from the platz a five mibnute walk away takes around 15 mins to get there. Under the flight path for tegel so it can get very noisy, that and the main road outside. No hot water in the shower, cookie on the pillow and a welcome bottle of water that if you drink you will be charged €3.50!, handy for local shops, kebab shop is across the road Friendly and helpful staff.. Really just one for an early flight from tegel.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, value for money, but noisy hotel”
Reviews.Author: smiley70
Reviews.Content: This hotel and my room were clean, and value for money. The staff were friendly, and spoke some english. The location was 5-7 mins walk from the 'Kurt Schumacher Platz' U-Bahn station, just as advertised. There was a large supermarket between that U-Bahn station and the hotel. This was handy, because I just had the room only, without any breakfast. The hotel was in a nice, safe looking area. Bad points ;--- I stayed in a room at the front of the hotel, and there was noise from traffic most of the night. The window sound insulation was very poor. Although I knew I was staying on a 'Room only, excluding breakfast' basis, I expected at least a kettle in the room for making tea/coffee. But there was no kettle at all.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Compact Hotel”
Reviews.Author: MissRobinson
Reviews.Content: There was nothing particularly great about this hotel. I hate a good nights rest before the flight. Everything went smooth - the premise clean, the service brisk and very efficient. The decor could do with an update...

Reviews.Title: “Very pleasant hotel near Tegel Airport. Good value for money”
Reviews.Author: Randomtox
Reviews.Content: This hotel is clean, comfortable, great value for money and very near all the amenities of Berlin (U-Bahn, airport etc). The staff are very friendly and helpful. I would definately stay here again if I were in Berlin.

Reviews.Title: “Ten men went to Berlin.....”
Reviews.Author: packed2go
Reviews.Content: Two night stay in hotel on room only basis. Hotel staff were friendly and attentive (lending Nokia charger and organising taxis etc). Plently of supermarkets (with cafes) near hotel and tube station 5 min walk. Italian restuarant next to this is excellent as is Irish themed pub. Decor in hotel requires some cosmetic work but dont let this put you off a very pleasant hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Loved the Carat, Great Fruhstuck”
Reviews.Author: Owenz
Reviews.Content: For the money, it was totally worth it. The best Fruhstuck that we had in Berlin, great meat and deviled eggs with caviar. It was close to the airport. The room was clean. The road outside was a little bit noisy. Bathroom was clean. Very easy access to the train and less than 10 Euros to the airport. The staff were great and spoke excellent English. We only stayed one night on the way to conference to Potsdam so I can't comment on how close or easy it was to get to the heart of Berlin. Very reasonable price, would totally stay here again.

HotelInfo.Name: Hotel Carat
HotelInfo.Address: Ollenhauerstrasse 111, 13403 Berlin, Germany
